alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN SHASTA COUNTY THROUGH 700 PM PST... At 556 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Round Mountain to Palo Cedro to Olinda. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Local road flooding is possible. Locations impacted include... Redding Airport, Shingletown, Palo Cedro, Anderson, Whitmore, Cassel, Inwood, Olinda, Round Mountain, Millville, Viola, Montgomery Creek, and Burney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
